text: Farrah Brittany Aldjufrie (born October 31, 1988) is an American television personality and real estate agent. She has appeared as a main cast member on the Netflix reality television series Buying Beverly Hills since 2022. == Early life == Farrah Brittany Aldjufrie was born in Los Angeles, California on October 31, 1988, as the only child to Guraish Aldjufrie (born 1964), a real- estate tycoon, and Kyle Richards, an actress. She has three younger half- sisters; Alexia, Sophia and Portia Umansky; Portia is also her goddaughter. Mauricio Umansky has been her stepfather since she was five-years-old. Farrah graduated from New York University with her associate's degree in Liberal Studies. She later graduated Magna Cum Laude from the University of Southern California with her Bachelor of Science degree in psychology, minoring in business. === Family === Farrah's cousins through her aunt Kim Richards are Brooke Brinson, Whitney and Chad Davis, and Kimberly Jackson. She is also related to the Hilton family, through her aunt Kathy Hilton's marriage to uncle Richard Hilton; her cousins are Paris, Nicky, Barron, and Conrad Hilton III. Her maternal grandparents were Ken Richards, a retired lieutenant colonel, and Kathleen Richards, a casting director. == Career == Farrah made her television debut in October 2010, on the Bravo reality television series The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills. Farrah has worked as a real estate agent at The Agency RE, a global boutique real estate brokerage, based in Beverly Hills, California, which was co-founded by her stepfather Mauricio Umansky, since 2011. She serves as the Director of Client Relations. She is currently a senior agent. Brittany was ranked #66 on the Los Angeles Business Journal's 500 most influential people of 2018. Farrah has appeared as a main cast member on the Netflix reality television series Buying Beverly Hills since November 4, 2022. The series focuses on Brittany and the team, along with the clients at The Agency RE. == Personal life == Farrah was in a relationship with Alex Manos, the owner and President of Beverly Hills Car Club, from 2018 to 2024. The couple announced their engagement on November 28, 2021. In March 2024, she announced that they had separated. Farrah resides in Los Angeles, California. She also owns her own home. Her mother and stepfather separated in 2023. == Filmography == Year Title Notes Ref. 2010–present The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills 45 episodes 2022 Watch What Happens Live! with Andy Cohen 1 episode 2022 Loose Women 1 episodes 2022–present Buying Beverly Hills 18 episodes 2023 Dancing with the Stars 32nd season; 1 episode == References == Category:1988 births Category:Living people
title: Farrah Brittany
